messages.title: Why I am backing Emma Dent Coad
messages.content: Over her years as councillor, Emma has been a passionate advocate for Kensington’s citizens, showing special concern for those who have failed to benefit from our Government’s disinterest in them. In addition, Emma’s professional and academic talents indicate a ready understanding with all this. I know in Kensington and elsewhere, who find that their precarious status is made even more precarious.

messages.title: Our pledges to you
messages.content: Working for all our communities. Protecting our environment. Improving health care for all. Protecting local businesses, jobs and training. Getting the best deal out of Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackling crime in the local community
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Re-investing in community policing, bringing safety back into our neighbourhoods and reversing the rise in crime.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Providing high quality homes for local residents
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Exposing negligence in the standards of existing housing, raising the quality of new developments, and regulating buy-to-leave investors.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Representing Kensington in the Brexit negotiations
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support remaining in the EU, while arguing for the best deal for all residents, sustaining and enhancing existing trade deals.

issues.brexitEurope: Representing Kensington in the Brexit negotiations.
issues.labourEmployment: Protecting local businesses, jobs and training.
issues.lawCrime: Tackling crime in the local community.

community.content: Working for all our communities. I'll work to protect Kensington from unwanted development and support truly affordable housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I hope you will support me as your local candidate with an excellent track record of challenging the Council and standing up for residents.

politicalExperience.role: Local councillor in Kensington for eleven years
politicalExperience.achievements: Continuously fought to protect the integrity and character of our communities.

contactInformation.address: Kensington Labour, c/o 95 St Marks Road, London W10 6JW

endorsements.endorsement: Over her years as councillor, Emma has been a passionate advocate for Kensington’s citizens, showing special concern for those who have failed to benefit from our Government’s disinterest in them.

images.caption: Working to save all our local communities

examples: Nearly 70% of Kensington residents voted to remain in the EU, while our Tory MP supported hard Brexit.
I am a writer, researcher, and journalist in the field of design, architecture and planning.
As a local councillor in Kensington for eleven years, I have continuously fought to protect the integrity and character of our communities.
Tackling crime in the local community.
Providing high quality homes for local residents.
Representing Kensington in the Brexit negotiations.

personalStories.story: I was born and bred in the Borough and have lived in Ladbroke Grove for 30 years.
